p: All the other extracts of L. mollissima, aqueous extracts of E. abyssinica, Z. chalybeum and S. didymobotrya (pods and leaves), and water and methanol extracts of S. africana as well as methanol and dichloromethane extracts of T. brownii, E. abyssinica, S. pinnata, Z. chalybeum, T. diversifolia (leaves and flowers), S. didymobotrya (pods and leaves), and C. edulis exhibited low selectivity indices (<10) ( Table 4).
